agent.name: Windfall
agent.description: Spatially-routed LLM inference gateway for AI agents on Base. Routes every request to the cheapest model on the cleanest energy. 200+ models via OpenRouter, $0.004/request, onchain EAS attestations, real-time energy oracle, semantic caching.

services.name: LLM Inference (Greenest)
services.description: OpenAI-compatible chat completions routed to the greenest compute node. Default model: DeepSeek V3 (auto-selected by engagement classifier). Includes onchain attestation of energy source.

output_schema.windfall: {node, location, mode, energyPricePerKwh, carbonIntensityGCO2, renewablePercent, costUsd}

features: Semantic response caching (cache hits are free)
x402 native payments (no API key needed)

services.name: LLM Inference (Cheapest)
services.description: Same as Greenest but routes to the cheapest compute node regardless of energy source. Lower cost during off-peak/curtailment events.
